## isOrthagonal variable

Returns true, if given square matrix of size `n` is orthagonal, i.e. check if `A * AT = I`<!-- -->.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orthogonal\_matrix](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orthogonal_matrix)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isOrthagonal: (m: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, n: number, eps?: number) => boolean
```
